abstract: John Malone's Liberty Media appeared to be close to victory on Friday in its often sharp-elbowed battle to take over Sirius XM Radio, Amy Chozick reports in The New York Times. Liberty said it planned to increase its stake in Sirius from 48 percent to more than 50 percent, which would give Mr. Malone's company definitive control of the satellite radio service.

headline.main: Liberty Media Close to Sirius XM Takeover
